removeDoerobject

english.t[5881]

Superclass
Tree

Property
Summary

Method
Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

In English, Remove X might mean take it off (if we're wearing it) or take it (if it's simply a free-standing object). We handle this with a Doer in the English-specific library (a) because this ambiguity may be **`removeDoer`**` :   `[`Doer`](../object/Doer.html)

Superclass Tree   (in declaration order)

removeDoer
`         [Doer](../object/Doer.html)                 [Redirector](../object/Redirector.html)                         object`
